actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5, subchapter II, of title 5, United States Code, to provide for improved administrative procedures.

summary.text: Defines the term "rule" for purposes of administrative procedures before agencies of the United States as meaning the whole or a part of an agency statement of general applicability and future effect designed to implement, interpret, or prescribe law or policy or to describe the organization, procedure, or practice requirements of any agency. Separates "ratemaking and cognate procedings" from the definition of the term "rule" for administrative procedures. Limits the exemption for military or foreign affairs matters under the administrative procedures rule making requirements of agencies. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 551, 553, 556, 557)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 5, subchapter II, of title 5, United States Code, to provide for improved administrative procedures.
